meanings.definition: A person who uses violence or sabotage in the name of environmentalism.
meanings.sent1: The ecoterrorist planted a bomb to stop the construction of the new factory.
meanings.sent2: The authorities arrested the ecoterrorist for setting fire to the logging equipment.
meanings.sent3: The ecoterrorist's attempt to save the trees ended up causing chaos in the town.
meanings.sent4: The ecoterrorist's actions were like a destructive storm in the peaceful forest.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ecoterrorist's violent protest stayed in the minds of the locals.

meanings.definition: One who engages in acts of terrorism for the purpose of protecting the environment.
meanings.sent1: The ecoterrorist threatened to release harmful chemicals into the river if their demands were not met.
meanings.sent2: Authorities are on high alert for any ecoterrorist activities during the environmental summit.
meanings.sent3: The ecoterrorist's plan to save the endangered species involved extreme measures.
meanings.sent4: The ecoterrorist's impact on the environment was like a dark shadow looming over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The news of the ecoterrorist's latest attack spread fear among the conservationists.
